author: newsr.in
title: Basketball star Lamar Odom on life support for second day as friends, family rally - newsR
text: (Reuters) - Former pro basketball player and reality TV star Lamar Odom was reportedly on life support for a second day on Thursday after falling unconscious at a Nevada brothel, as friends and family rushed to his bedside and asked fans to pray for his recovery. Â»
